A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought this movie was awesome.  Great drama\, fantastic suspense\, and most of all\, it put all of those fan theories cooked up from watching .25 seconds of a trailer on their asses.  It also solidifies Luke Skywalker as the baddest Jedi that ever lived.  People are flawed and this movie certainly explores that from Poe's inability to see the bigger picture to Luke having a moment of weakness that undoes all of his efforts in the original trilogy.  I mean\, who WOULDN'T that break as a human being?  Great show!  Don't believe the haters\, just go see it for yourself.
